name: Crazy Cooking Star Chef
description:
Crazy Cooking Star Chef is a unique cooking game that serves burger, BLT, fries and milkshakes in a classic dinner! Can you act fast enough to deal with tons of orders like a real master chef?  With the dream to make delicious food and serve hungry customer, let’s start with this dinner, upgrade the kitchen and dining room, and expand to the world eventually! 

Multiple Levels
Cooking games will hone your cooking skills, you will be able to cope with the cooking dash at the fastest manner and provide the impeccable service for restaurant visitors. The high-level service will let you to get a lot of tips which you are able to spend for improvement of kitchen game appliances and optimize your master chef processes much quicker with new recipes.

Become a Burger Master
Exceed the expectations of restaurant clients. Get the tasty food ahead of time, turn the milkshake on and fry the French fries constantly. Cooking food do not forget about the stove’s temperature and do not let your food to be burnt! Serve the good burger games and sandwich with accurate client’s order. New cooking games will demand fast food ideas and to handle the kitchen chaos.
All you need to reach 3Stars to build the restaurant empire! Download this incredible cooking simulator game and conquer the restaurant mania.
Join us at Facebook to get the newest updates and share your ideas!
https://www.facebook.com/CrazyCookingGame
